title: Just because it is a 4v5 doesn't mean you give up and start inting.
body: If it's a ranked game try your best to win even if it's 4v5 or 3v5. I will still vote no to surrender votes.

replies.body: This is what is really wrong with the game. people like you. You have 0 chance to win and yet you still want to waste everyone's time especially when you aren't even playing a fair game. You should be able to leave the game if a teammate is gone for like 5 minutes. You aren't winning a 4v5 let alone a 3v5

3v5 I can understand bailing. But 4v5 you still have a chance (depending on the matchup).  I've seen plenty enough 4v5 wins.  
To be fair, 4v5 does lose in most scenarios, but it's not automatic. Def worth fighting out a bit.

If your team has only  1 hyper carry and they afk, then ff, It all comes down to team comp and theirs if you want to continue fighting in a 20 min snowball fiesta, because usually, you're just hurting your teams own sanity as they suffer for your never surrender logic, I definitely do not want to play a 1 hour stalled game that we tried our best and still we lost, withered, and exhausted after arguing with each other as the enemy says haha gg ez ty for the free lp afk.
You see, I'm fine with 4v5, but if it's 4v6, might aswell give up.
